Reviews.Title: Larger than expected (4.5" diameter)
Reviews.Author: The Engineer Critic
Reviews.Content: Initially I was surprised by how huge this camera is, at 4.5" diameter and 4" high.The picture looks good so far, but will add more comments later.

Reviews.Title: Avue A666SW 1/3" Sony CCD IR Dome Camera
Reviews.Author: mariong
Reviews.Content: This camera is a little larger then I expected, but not a problem. It has a very clear picture both day and night .In my case it isn't completely dark becouse of the street light about 200 ft away but I can see almost as well at night as I can during the day.This camera is well worth the price .I gave it 4 stars becouse I dont think that a camera at this price point deserves five stars.
